name: minesweeper-react
description: React minesweeper with npm as build tool

scripts.dev: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-html & npm run server
scripts.build:dirs: mkdir build & mkdir build/images & mkdir build/css & mkdir build/js
scripts.build:styles: npm run build:styles:css & npm run build:styles:js
scripts.build: npm run clean & npm run build:dirs & npm run build:images & npm run build:styles & browserify src/js/minesweeper-app.js -t babelify -g uglifyify -o build/app.js  & cp src/html/* ./build

author: Davor Obilinovic
